Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE PROCEDURE [business_calendar_compile](@force char(1), @TZ_NAME NVARCHAR(50) = NULL) AS BEGIN IF @force = '1' DELETE FROM BUSINESS_CALENDAR DECLARE @K INT EXEC [innovator].[business_calendar_compile_check] @TZ_NAME SET @K = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUSINESS_CALENDAR) SELECT 'SUCCESS' as result_status, 'OK: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), @K) + ' DAYS' as result_text END
Item.name: business_calendar_compile
